metadata.title: CVE-2019-18786 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel through 5.3.8, f->fmt.sdr.reserved is uninitialized inrcar_drif_g_fmt_sdr_cap in drivers/media/platform/rcar_drif.c, which couldcause a memory disclosure problem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-azure - 4.15.0-1071.76~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
